website_summaries.verdict: SPLASH is top-tier marine antifreeze for colder climates because it safeguards against temperatures as low as -50°F, and it’s a safer nontoxic option for user around children and pets too.
cons: This marine antifreeze is best for cooler climates, so look elsewhere if you prefer warmer waters

customer_reviews.title: Go to your local auto parts store!
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday, I paid less than $10 for 2 gallons of RV anti-freeze at my local AutoZone store. THIS particular item which I bought over a month ago was just shy of $15. I'll know better next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Bye

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Did find the same thing in my local hardware store for 2.97USD.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Got it for a steal
customer_reviews.text: Picked it up on sale, great price. This stuff works great in my RV and cabin - never had a problem with it. Much safer in the toilets in case the dog decides to taste it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great antifreeze
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good product. Good to 50 below. Most other rv antifreeze don't go that low. Received it just in time for winter
customer_reviews.author: epi

customer_reviews.title: Pink stuff you shouldn’t eat
customer_reviews.text: Is what it is. Can’t see it being any better or any worse then any other.
customer_reviews.author: Damager

customer_reviews.title: Time to winterize the boat
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I use this once a year to winterize my boat. Work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my Boat and spray washers!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to flush my outboard engines, drop some in the blidge and winterized my pwer and spray washers. Works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good antifreeze
customer_reviews.text: Buying locally is a lot less expensive. This is convenient to have it delivered. It is good RV antifreeze. Have been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: good for pool winterizing
customer_reviews.text: affordable, I use it to close my pool for winter
customer_reviews.author: Steward Green

customer_reviews.title: It works if it hasn't all spilled out in the box...
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, does what it's meant to do. The company selling it needs to take a lesson in shipping liquids, because a handless blind person could of done a better job.
customer_reviews.author: The Lost Texan

customer_reviews.title: Frozen solid
customer_reviews.text: -10F this morning. Currently about 10F. Frozen solid and the bottom of the bottle has been pushed out.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouging
customer_reviews.text: Go to the parts store it's 5.99 this is a gouging. Amazon got everyone used to them being the cheapest now they're turning the screws! Beware
customer_reviews.author: JEREMIAH

customer_reviews.title: Freezes and expands
customer_reviews.text: Bought some, left it sitting out overnight in zero temps and the stuff was frozen HARD and the bottom of the bottle expanded out. Not going in my boat. Beware...unless of course, you want use this in southern climates
customer_reviews.author: John R. Schloot

customer_reviews.title: Winterize our Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Using in my outdoor fountain. We drained it first, but worry about leftover water. Long Island winterizing
customer_reviews.author: M from New York

product_meta.title: SPLASH 619526 Pink 1 gal. Automotive Accessories
product_meta.description: Antifreeze, RV/Marine, Container Size 1 Gallon, Size/Net Weight 8 1/2 lb., Pink, Boiling Point 370 F, Flash Point 225 F, 1. 038 Specific Gravity, For Use With RV/Marine Vehicles
